title: FontFont
content:
FontFont was created by [Neville Brody](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Neville%20Brody) and [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann) in 1990 to produce cutting-edge typefaces by designers for designers. Today, the FontFont library represents hundreds of the world's most innovative type designers.

The [FontFont TypeBoard](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont%20TypeBoard) meets every six months at [FontShop International](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) in Berlin to review and select new designs for the library.

**URL:** [http://www.fontfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/www.fontfont.com/ "http://www.fontfont.com") or at [FontShop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/foundry/fontfont/)

**Font Releases**

[FontFont 1990](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont%201990)  
 [FontFont 1991](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont%201991)

 [FontFont 1995](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont%201995)

 [FontFont 2000](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont%202000)  
 [FontFont 2001](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont%202001)

author: Jared Benson
